p: The root of the C. auriculata plant was collected from Chandravana botanical garden, maintained by Mysore Medical College, Mysuru. After the collection of the plant, it was authenticated by a botany expert, and the voucher number of the herbarium submitted is UOMBOT20CA17. The root was rinsed thoroughly in distilled water and alcohol, shade-dried, coarsely powdered in a hammer mill, and stored in a sealed container at −20 °C until further use.
